src:
Olala, Keanu ni samski
07 Nov 2019, 14:53 by Uredništvo Pn

Oboževalke ameriškega filmskega zvezdnika Keanua Reevesa imajo za seboj najbrž noč brez spanca in slab dan.



Foto: Profimedia

NEW YORK > Včeraj je namreč v svetovnih medijih odjeknila novička, da privlačni Keanu po več kot dvajsetih letih tudi uradno ni samski. Fotografski aparati so ga v svoj objektiv ujeli na neki prireditvi skupaj z nekaj let mlajšo umetnico Alexandro Grant.
Zaljubljen par, ki tega pred paparaci sploh ni skrival, se pozna že nekaj let. Dobro obveščeni menijo, da so prve iskrice med njima preskočile že pred osmimi leti, ko je Grantova ilustrirala igralčevo knjigo Ode to Happiness, leta 2016 pa tudi njegovo drugo knjigo Shadows.
55-letni zvezdnik in devet let mlajša izbranka sta bila pred zbranimi fotografi in novinarji zelo sproščena, ves čas sta se držala za roke in si izmenjevala poglede ter klepetala z drugimi gosti.
Ameriški tabloidi so bili že nekaj časa “na sledi” domnevnemu paru, saj so sumili, da je Keanu prav v Alexandri našel sorodno dušo. Sredi oktobra so ju ujeli v eni izmed losangeleških restavracij, ko je Alexandra na Keanuja naslonila glavo, nato pa sta z roko v roki odšla tudi na sprehod.
text:
Olala, Keanu is not single
07 Nov 2019, 14:53 by Uredništvo Pn

Fans of American movie star Keanu Reeves are likely to have a sleepless night and a bad day.



Photo: Profimedia

NEW YORK> There was a news yesterday in the world that the attractive Kean is not officially single after more than twenty years. He was captured by a photographer at an event together with several years younger artist Alexandra Grant.
A couple in love who has never hidden it from the paparazzi has known each other for several years. Well-informed people believe that the first spark between them was skipped eight years ago, when Grant illustrated the actor's book Ode to Happiness and in 2016 his second book, Shadows.
The 55-year-old star and nine-year-old girl were very relaxed before the assembled photographers and journalists, holding hands and exchanging views and chatting with other guests.
The American tabloids have been "following" the alleged couple for some time, suspecting that Keanu had found a soulmate in Alexandra. They were caught in one of the Los Angeles restaurants in mid-October when Alexandra leaned her head on Keanu and then went for a walk in hand.
